content: I have a pull request that hasn't been reviewed in a while, and I need help adding a reference in Mathlib. I would like some guidance. If you can please go to pull request #14269 titled "# feat(NumberTheory/FactorisationProperties): abundant, pseudoperfect, deficient, and weird numbers" to help me out.
The right place to ask for reviews is #PR reviews, or github by requesting reviews from who you think might be interested
Please make the change to the bib file. It's much easier for someone else to touch up than to fill it in from the citation in the comment
